author: philcares
content: What are open questions to tackle currently?

author: afdudley
content: There is currently a desire to merge the two transaction types into one type and add a penalty to the legacy type such that it will be unusable in two years.

author: lightclient
content: Hi all, I'm working on an implementation of EIP-2718: Typed Transaction Envelopes. Given that EIP-1559 would be an important user of this EIP here and that this group has some of the few devs that have made significant changes to the transaction object, it would be helpful to hear some feedback early on regarding the design. If anyone here has a chance to do so, I've opened a draft PR to coordinate the feedback: https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/pull/21502
